title: Orc Bowmen (1R264)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. While you can spot a [Sauron] Orc, add 1 to the minion archery total.
Lore:	Where volleys of Orcish arrows fly, the defenders of the West fall.
Rarity:	R
